overview: Enric has a degree in Economics from the Universitat de Barcelona, more specifically with the EUS program, and a postgraduate in Creation of Business from the IE Business School. Besides being external teacher at the Universitat AutÃ²noma in Bellaterra in the Masterâ€™s Degree in Marketing and Communication, Enric is a regular attendee and speaker in conferences on Mobile Advertising and several forums, events and associations such as the MMA. Actually Enric is Board Member of the MMA association in Spain. His experience begins in the UK in the financial field, working as the controller of Synthomer Limited (Chemical-Pharmaceutical Firm). In turn, he gets into the auditing world and starts to work for the bank department at Deloitte & Touche. His recent professional experience and his business spirit have led him to be one of the founders of the firm itself. To a large extent, he is the person who, with an innovative vision, has been in charge of joining the present team of CPM Telecom. Enric is currently the CEO of Telecom CPM besides being a Advisor in several other companies in TIC and Media which he participates.
